get.description: Lists all the available Namespaces within a subscription, irrespective of the resource groups.
Lists the available Namespaces within a resource group.

put.description: Creates or updates a namespace. Once created, this namespace's resource manifest is immutable. This operation is idempotent.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for creating a namespace resource.

202.description: Namespace create or update request accepted.

delete.description: Deletes an existing namespace. This operation also removes all associated resources under the namespace.

get.description: Gets the description of the specified namespace.

patch.description: Creates or updates a namespace. Once created, this namespace's resource manifest is immutable. This operation is idempotent.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for updating a namespace resource.

202.description: Namespace create or update request accepted.

get.description: Gets a list of authorization rules for a Namespace.

post.description: Gets a list of authorization rules for a Namespace.

put.description: Creates or updates an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace.

delete.description: Deletes an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace.

post.description: Gets an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace by rule name.

get.description: Gets all the Event Hubs in a Namespace.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of Event Hubs.

put.description: Creates or updates a new Event Hub as a nested resource within a Namespace.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create an Event Hub resource.

delete.description: Deletes an Event Hub from the specified Namespace and resource group.

get.description: Gets the authorization rules for an Event Hub.

put.description: Creates or updates an AuthorizationRule for the specified Event Hub.

get.description: Gets an AuthorizationRule for an Event Hub by rule name.

put.description: Creates or updates an Event Hubs consumer group as a nested resource within a Namespace.

delete.description: Deletes a consumer group from the specified Event Hub and resource group.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the consumer group description.

get.description: Gets all the consumer groups in a Namespace. An empty feed is returned if no consumer group exists in the Namespace.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of consumer groups.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Invoice, etc.
